contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Campaignbox US war in Afghanistan}} '''Operation Headstrong''' (2003â€“2004) involves the training of [[Afghanistan|Afghan]] commandos by [[United Kingdom|British]] special forces to seek out and destroy drug laboratories and to confiscate drug shipments.{{Citation needed|date=March 2007}} [[Category:Operations involving British special forces|Headstrong]] [[Category:Non-combat military operations involving the United Kingdom|Headstrong]] {{Mil-stub}}
